amendment.description: To end payments to landlords who are endangering the lives of children and needy families.

action.text: Amendment SA 792 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 184.

Amendment SA 792 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6651-6653; text: CR S6651) To end payments to landlords who are endangering the lives of children and needy families.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 792 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 184.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 792 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 184.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 792 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
